settings.label: Please Make Sure To Fill Out All Required Fields
MEDICAL INFORMATION
settings.description: You are required to advise at registration of any medical conditions or medication, knowledge of which might be vital in the event of rescue; for example, asthma or diabetes.

settings.label: Please select one of the following
DATA PRIVACY
settings.description:
South Caernarvonshire Yacht Club "The Club"

Your privacy is important to us. We handle any data we collect in line with current data protection legislation.

Our full Data Privacy Statement can be found on our website at www.scyc.co.uk.

settings.label: FUTURE CONTACT - The Club would like to contact you by email in the future to give details of sailing events that may be of interest to you. Please confirm that you give consent to be contacted for this purpose.

PHOTOGRAPHS - The Club may arrange for photographs to be taken during the sailing event and published on our website and other media channels to promote the Club. Please confirm that you give consent to your image.
I consent to the use of my image
I consent to the use of my image

settings.html_codes: By agreeing to your images being used, you agree to assign any copyright or any other right of ownership of these images to the Club.

To be signed by Helm

I confirm that the information given in this entry form is correct. 

  • I agree to the Edinburgh Cup/ Northerns "Notice of Race" Conditions of Entry and have read the SCYC Health and Safety Policies and Procedures (Summary). Click here.
